attributes.action: Stop convert speed cameras on motorways
attributes.additional_details:
Speed camera where passed in law on the basis that they would be used to be visible to slow motorists down, not as a cash cow for the Goverment.

Motorist already are leaned on enough from this Goverment as a source of revenue, it is accepted that speed cameras around pedestrian zones and schools etc are a good idea.  However leave our motorways alone.

Give the public a vote on this and you will see how unpopular it is,  stop opressing the view of a few on the many.

We demand this proposal is put to a vote for the people or is this really a democracy!
